name: Copy of STREAMING SITE WEB 5
description: A professional-grade live stream monitoring application for video and audio feeds using HLS, featuring a drag-and-drop custom grid.
prompt: Create a professional-looking live stream monitoring application. The main feature is a customizable grid of video and audio players that can be rearranged using drag-and-drop. Include a control panel to add new streams, change the grid size, and manage configurations.
author: Hicham Ibnoukhaldoun
